com.echsylon.atlantis

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.echsylon.atlantis.Configuration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Configuration
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class contains all request mockRequests the Atlantis local web server will ever serve. This is the "mocked Internet".
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Configuration.Builder
      This class offers means of building a configuration object directly from code (as opposed to configure one in a JSON asset or file).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HeaderManager defaultResponseHeaderManager()
      Returns the header manager managing the default response headers.
      String fallbackBaseUrl()
      Deprecated. 
      Use defaultSettingsManager() instead. Planned to be removed in Atlantis 3.0
      MockRequest.Filter requestFilter()
      Returns the request filter of this configuration.
      List<MockRequest> requests()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of the currently tracked request mockRequests in this configuration.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • fallbackBaseUrl

        public String fallbackBaseUrl()
        Deprecated. Use defaultSettingsManager() instead. Planned to be removed in Atlantis 3.0
        Returns the fallback base url for this configuration. If given and Atlantis is configured to fall back to real world responses, this is the suggested real world base URL to target (replacing "localhost") if no configuration was found for a request.
        Returns:
        The fallback base url or null.

      • requestFilter

        public MockRequest.Filter requestFilter()
        Returns the request filter of this configuration.
        Returns:
        The request filter or null.

      • requests

        public List<MockRequest> requests()
        Returns an unmodifiable list of the currently tracked request mockRequests in this configuration.
        Returns:
        A list of known request mockRequests. The list is unmodifiable as per definition in Collections.unmodifiableList(List).

      • defaultResponseHeaderManager

        public HeaderManager defaultResponseHeaderManager()
        Returns the header manager managing the default response headers.
        Returns:
        The default response header manager. Never null.
